summary: A group of medical students devise a deadly game: to see which one of them can commit the perfect murder.
cast: Milo Ventimiglia|Michael Weston|Alyssa Milano|Lauren Lee Smith|Johnny Whitworth|John de Lancie|Mei Melançon|Keir O'Donnell|Buddy Lewis|Dan Callahan|Larry Drake|Med Abrous|Alan Blumenfeld|Gary Buckner|Jeb Burris|Eurydice Davis|Jarvis W. George|Anne Girard|Eric Kaldor|Keith Morris|Kate Mulligan|Donnie Smith|Yvonne Mojica-Nelson|Debbie Pollack|Cheryl Starbuck|Sam Witwer|Don Abernathy|Brett Kelly|Eddie Mariano|Carol Shook|Waneeki Yokomee-Fung
title: Juegos criminales
